title: mahaa gaNapathE
sahitya:
mahA gaNapatE manasA smarAmi mahAdEvamudam shirasA namAmi 
mAtangAnanam mahEshvaram tApatrayayuta bhavarOga bhaiSajam
anupallavi

shatakOTi vighna parihAra caraNam shAntyAdi sarva kalyANa guNadim 
hadantaram nikhila lOkagam shivam parampadam pradam pratatam
caraNam

brahmAnandAntagarta bhUSithAm yajurAdi vEda shikharastham 
nitAnta shuddhAntaha kAraNastham prashastam taTastham samastam tam
